title: Tom Cheeseman
text:
Tom Cheeseman (born 22 March 1986) is a <a href="Wales">Welsh</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer currently playing for <a href="Esher%20RFC">Esher</a>. He is a former <a href="Wales%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Wales</a> Under-19 international. In September 2010 Cheeseman joined the <a href="Dragons%20%28rugby%20union%29">Newport Gwent Dragons</a> from <a href="Bath%20Rugby">Bath</a> on loan until the end of the <a href="2010%E2%80%9311%20Magners%20League">2010–11 Magners League</a>. In February 2011 he joined <a href="Harlequin%20F.C.">Harlequins</a> before joining <a href="Esher%20RFC">Esher</a> in June 2011 on a deal that meant he could continue to train with <a href="Harlequin%20F.C.">Harlequins</a>.
His father <a href="Trevor%20Chessman">Trevor Cheeseman</a> is a former <a href="England%20Saxons">England B</a> international <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%234.%20.26%205.%20Lock">Second Row</a> <a href="Forward%20%28rugby%20union%29">forward</a> who currently teaches <a href="Physical%20Education">Physical Education</a> at <a href="Olchfa%20Comprehensive%20School">Olchfa Comprehensive School</a> in <a href="Swansea">Swansea</a>.
